languages.text: "Любое промедление, связанное с погрузкой и доставкой на корабль, грозит потерей драгоценного времени. Не обманывай себя, {name}: теша самолюбие, ты обрекаешь миллиарды на вечные муки в руках Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "Любое промедление, связанное с погрузкой и доставкой на корабль, грозит потерей драгоценного времени. Не обманывай себя, {name}: теша самолюбие, ты обрекаешь миллиарды на вечные муки в руках Архиврага".

languages.text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: "Любое промедление, связанное с погрузкой и доставкой на корабль, грозит потерей драгоценного времени. Не обманывай себя, {name}: теша самолюбие, ты обрекаешь миллиарды на вечные муки в руках Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting people to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity by saving a few hundred people on a whim, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

"Any delay caused by loading and transporting people to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity by saving a few hundred people on a whim, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

"Any delay caused by loading and transporting people to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity by saving a few hundred people on a whim, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

"Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

"Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

"Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

languages.text: “装载、运输民众到飞船上会造成延误，这会白白浪费我们的宝贵时间。不要再自欺欺人了，{name}。如果你纵容你的虚荣心，那么几十亿人都会落在混沌大敌的手中，遭到永无止境的折磨。”
languages.original_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: “装载、运输民众到飞船上会造成延误，这会白白浪费我们的宝贵时间。不要再自欺欺人了，{name}。如果你纵容你的虚荣心，打算心血来潮地拯救几百个人的话，那么几十亿人都会落在混沌大敌的手中，遭到永无止境的折磨。”

languages.text: 「船への積み込みや輸送に起因する遅れは、我々の貴重な時間を奪うことになる。己を欺いてはならない、{name}さん。虚栄心に溺れれば、渾沌の勢力の手によって、数十億人を永遠の苦しみに陥れることになるのだぞ」
languages.original_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: 「船への積み込みや輸送に起因する遅れは、我々の貴重な時間を奪うことになる。己を欺いてはならない。{name}気まぐれで数百人を救って虚栄心を満たしたとて、渾沌の勢力の手によって、数十億人を永遠の苦しみに陥れることになるのだぞ」
「船への積み込みや輸送に起因する遅れは、我々の貴重な時間を奪うことになる。己を欺いてはならない、{name}さん。虚栄心に溺れれば、渾沌の勢力の手によって、数十億人を永遠の苦しみに陥れることになるのだぞ」

languages.text: "Jede Verzögerung beim Verladen und beim Transport zum Schiff kostet uns wertvolle Zeit. Macht Euch nichts vor, {name} – wenn Ihr Eure Eitelkeit befriedigt, verurteilt Ihr Milliarden zu ewiger Qual durch die Hand des Erzfeinds."
languages.original_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Jede Verzögerung beim Verladen und Transportieren von Personen auf das Schiff kostet uns wertvolle Zeit. Macht Euch nichts vor, {name} – wenn Ihr Eure Eitelkeit befriedigt und aufgrund einer Laune einige Hundert Menschen rettet, verurteilt Ihr Milliarden zu ewiger Qual durch die Hand des Erzfeinds."

languages.text: « Les manœuvres d'évacuation vers notre vaisseau vont nous coûter un temps précieux. Ne vous bercez pas d'illusions, {name}. Si vous laissez libre cours à votre vanité, vous condamnerez des milliards d'innocents au tourment éternel entre les mains du Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: « Les manœuvres d'évacuation vers notre vaisseau vont nous coûter un temps précieux. Ne vous bercez pas d'illusions, {name}. Si vous laissez libre cours à votre vanité pour sauver quelques centaines de personnes sur un coup de tête, vous en condamnerez des milliards au tourment éternel entre les mains du Grand Ennemi. »

languages.text: «Cualquier retraso ocasionado por transportar cosas a la nave conllevará un gran coste. No se engañe, {name}: si satisface su vanidad, condenará a miles de millones al tormento eterno a manos del Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier retraso ocasionado por el transporte de gente a la nave conllevará un gran coste. No se engañe, {name}: si satisface su vanidad salvando a unos cientos de personas, condenará a billones al tormento eterno a manos del Archienemigo».

languages.text: "Mekiklere binme ve nakil kaynaklı herhangi bir gecikme zaten az olan zamanımızdan kaybettirecek. Kendini kandırma {name}. Kibrine yenik düşersen milyarlarca insanı Şerbaşı'nın ellerinde sonsuz işkenceye mahkûm edersin."
languages.original_text: "Any delay caused by loading and transporting to the ship will cost us precious time. Do not deceive yourself, {name} — if you indulge your vanity, you will doom billions to eternal torment at the hands of the Archenemy."

traits.locale_text: "Mekiklere binme ve nakil kaynaklı herhangi bir gecikme zaten az olan zamanımızdan kaybettirecek. Kendini kandırma {name}. Kibrine yenik düşersen milyarlarca insanı Şerbaşı'nın ellerinde sonsuz işkenceye mahkûm edersin."
